number=int(raw_input())

swapper={'0':'0','6':'9','9':'6','8':'8',"1":"1"}

for _ in xrange(number):
    num=raw_input().strip()
    s=""
    for x in reversed(num):
        if x not in swapper:
            print "NO"
            break
        s+=swapper[x]
    else:
        print "YES"
        print s
